cast.overview: 14th-century Franciscan monk William of Baskerville and his young novice arrive at a conference to find that several monks have been murdered under mysterious circumstances. To solve the crimes, William must rise up against the Church's authority and fight the shadowy conspiracy of monastery monks using only his intelligence; which is considerable.
cast.title: The Name of the Rose

crew.overview: 14th-century Franciscan monk William of Baskerville and his young novice arrive at a conference to find that several monks have been murdered under mysterious circumstances. To solve the crimes, William must rise up against the Church's authority and fight the shadowy conspiracy of monastery monks using only his intelligence; which is considerable.
crew.title: The Name of the Rose

crew.original_title: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
crew.overview: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born in the stench of 18th century Paris, develops a superior olfactory sense, which he uses to create the world's finest perfumes. However, his work takes a dark turn as he tries to preserve scents in the search for the ultimate perfume.
crew.title: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer

details.biography: Andrew Birkin was born on December 9, 1945 in London, England, UK. He is a writer and director, known for Der Name der Rose (1986), The Cement Garden (1993) and Perfume: The Story of a Murderer (2006).
details.name: Andrew Birkin
